column1: #Text=\[Python\](https://img.shields.io/badge/python-3.10%5E-blue)\](https://www.python.org/)  # StarCraft II Datasets  Library can be used to interface with datasets that were pre-processed with our pipeline as described in: - \[SC2DatasetPreparator\](https://github.com/Kaszanas/SC2DatasetPreparator)  Currently we have exposed PyTorch and PyTorch Lightning API.
#Text=Our goal is to provide infrastructure used for StarCraft&nbsp\;II analytics.

#Text=Please refer to the \[\*\*official documentation\*\*\](https://sc2-datasets.readthedocs.io/), or contact contributors directly for all of the details.  ## Supported Datasets  ### SC2EGSet: StarCraft II Esport Game State Dataset  This project contains official API implementation for the \[SC2EGSet: StarCraft II Esport Game State Dataset\](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5503997), which is built based on \[SC2ReSet: StarCraft II Esport Replaypack Set\](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5575796).
#Text=Contents of this library provide PyTorch and PyTorch Lightning API for pre-processed StarCraft II dataset.  ## Installation  1.
#Text=Manually install PyTorch with minimal version of ```^1.11.0+cu116```. 2.
#Text=Perform the following command:  ```bash $ pip install sc2\_datasets ```  ## Usage  Basic example usage can be seen below.
#Text=For advanced interactions with the datasets please refer to the documentation.

#Text=Use \[SC2EGSet\](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5503997) with PyTorch: ```python from sc2\_datasets.torch.sc2\_egset\_dataset import SC2EGSetDataset from sc2\_datasets.available\_replaypacks import EXAMPLE\_SYNTHETIC\_REPLAYPACKS  if \_\_name\_\_ == "\_\_main\_\_":     # Initialize the dataset:     sc2\_egset\_dataset = SC2EGSetDataset(         unpack\_dir=".
